snippet: The economic numbers over the next couple of months, including the April 6 unemployment report, will have a major impact on President Obama’s re-election campaign.
abstract: News analysis; economic numbers over the next several months, including the April 6 unemployment report, will have bigger political implications than the typical batch of data on Pres Obama as he battles to be re-elected; many American voters are likely to base their decision on the economy, as gas prices rise and consumers remain deep in debt.
lead_paragraph: The economic numbers over the next couple of months, including the April 6 unemployment report, will have a major impact on President Obama’s re-election campaign.

headline.seo: Economy Plays Biggest Role in Obama Re-Election Chances
headline.main: Muddled Economic Picture Muddles the Political One, Too
